body:
Hi,


we also had trouble - the problem was libstdc++.so.5 which is an older 
version not available on our newer system. I made a dirty hack and 
installed in a VM an old version of ubuntu including this library and 
copied this then to our server. Finally it works. With /ldd hdrgen/ you 
can see, which libraries are needed and versions.


Jan
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/hdri/2017-September/000661.html).</sup>
